page.title: 09RELIGION
page.content:
ST.JOSEPH'S MONASTERY
St Joseph's Monastery is on Lawrence Street.The Poor Clare nuns never leave the monastery.Only one nun is allowed to leave the building to go out shopping.A monastery is where monks or nuns live in a big house with an enclosed garden.They make a vow of poverty so that they have no possesions.They tie their habits with a cord and tie three knots in it to stand for the three vows that they take.In the Monastery there are twenty or more nuns.The nuns wear Brown and White habits.Mother Superior must be obeyed by all the nuns. She makes all the decisions about the day to day running of the monastery.The nuns feed tramps with soup and bread.The nuns are vegetarians.They make altarbread and sew vestments.
